user_query: I'm planning a family vacation to Asia and I need to know the currency exchange rates for the next month. Can you provide me with the historical exchange rates for the US Dollar in China from 2022-07-01 to 2022-07-31? Additionally, I would like to get the VAT rates for all EU member states.

TaskList.description: Retrieve historical exchange rates for the US Dollar in China from 2022-07-01 to 2022-07-31.
Get the VAT rates for all EU member states.
